name: Metamagic Invocation
text: You have further refined your combination of elemental power and spellcasting with metamagic techniques.
benefit:
Choose a metamagic feat from the following list: Enlarge Spell, Extend Spell, Intuitive Spell, Logical Spell, Quicken Spell, Reach Spell, or Tenacious SpellUI. When casting a spell via Kinetic Invocation, you can increase its burn cost to augment the spell with that metamagic feat.

The burn cost increase is equal to the spell level increase applied by the feat. Augmenting a spell increases its casting time as if it were cast spontaneously.
special: You can take this feat more than once. Each time you take this feat, select another metamagic feat; you can augment a spell with multiple feats by accepting additional points of burn equal to the total increased spell level.
text_zh: 你通过超魔技术进一步增强了你的元素能力和施法的联系。
benefit_zh: 从下列超魔专长中选择一个：法术增远（Enlarge Spell），法术延时（Extend Spell），本能法术（Intuitive Spell，OA），逻辑法术（Logical Spell，OA），法术瞬发（Quicken Spell），及远法术（Reach Spell，APG），强固法术（Tenacious Spell，UI）。当你通过原力调用施放一个法术的时候，你可以增加它的超载来利用超魔专长增强该法术。超载增加的数值等于应用专长增加的法术环级。如此增强一个法术如同自发施放该法术一般增加它的施法时间。
special_zh: 你可以多次选择该专长。每次你选择该专长，选择另一个超魔专长；你可以通过承受等于总共增加的法术等级的额外超载，来使用多个超魔专长强化一个法术。
